title: Object Shredder
content:
Object Shredder is a gear primary ability in Splatoon 2 and Splatoon 3.

Object Shredder increases damage dealt to objects (non-player targets).

It effectively allows the user to destroy objects such as Squid Beakons and the Ballers with fewer hits than without this ability.

Object Shredder is the primary ability of:

Additionally, Murch or Spyke can replace the primary ability on a pair of shoes with Object Shredder by using 15 of each of the following ability chunks:

- Ink Recovery Up

- Special Power Up

- Sub Power Up
